item.title: Particles
item.description: Particle physics (E) - Particles Course Particle physics (E) Course No. Particles Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture English 3 4 ST Requirements for Participation: Preparation: Quantum Mechanics Form of Testing and Examination: Part of the obligatory courses for area of specialisation Nuclear and Particle Physics, separate oral examination is possible exceptionally.
